Only thing I enjoyed was the cheddar biscuits. Definitely not value for you money either.

Jon, was his name. Our server made the dinner an awesome feeling. He made sure all was right for us. Great job oh, the food was awesome lobster cooked just right, king crab legs not chewy. Dinner was delivered at right time and no food overlap. You know what I mean, not done with appetizers and dinner shows up. This is the best restaurant in Sugar Land.
Great service. Good food. Food came out in a timely manner, was cooked well. Prices have gone up....hooray for inflation. 😒 All in all, good decent place to eat.

Nice clean restaurant the service was excellent the food came out nice and hot and full of flavor. They give you nice bit of food for your money. Ps this has been one of the best locations I have been to. I will return.

name: The Sugar Refinery
address: 2248 Texas Dr, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA
reviews: This place saved our NYE celebrations. We initially had tickets to another "upscale" location that was anything but.. we left disappointed and pockets much lighter from the entry fee. However we felt right at home here and brought the New Year in with a great crowd!

This place is awesome! With very good not so common drinks that are a must try you have to check this place out! The Sugar Refinery has great snacks and a really good stake night! They even have flights on the menu for you drinking pleasure haaa. Over all a great place to sit and catch up with friends. The bar tenders are very nice and super knowledgeable. They ask the wright questions to get into your brain and serve you just what you never knew you were looking for. I will be a long time guest of this place! The smoked old fashioned was very delicious.

With not too many places in Sugar Land with a night life lounge feel to it Sugar Refinery is our go to. Great drinks, good music on the weekends and service is good. They can get busy so have to patient sometimes. But Zach the manager and Albert the bartender are usually there to make sure you have a good time.
Huge drink menu; something for everyone! Good food, music, and ambiance!

I was there on Tuesday afternoon, such a great ambiance! We got there early, our table was set up and our waiter was ready to take drinks orders. Lots of cocktail options, the best was their old fashion with smoke!!  The service was great and the food was good. Wish there’s more food options! But overall good experience

name: Vino & Vinyl
address: 15977 City Walk, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA
reviews: Such a cool and mellow vibe. A great place to unwind after a long day, or just a sweet spot to come and listen to records spin and people watch, or hang with friends. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable and the good is delicious. Great happy hour options as well. A great little neighborhood "dive".

Great place to go if you need a date night with a long lost friend. Or just to chill during happy hour. Friendly and attentive staff, attractive art and atmosphere. Definetly my favorite place for a drink in town center!

Looking for a chef crafted menu and fine dining (without breaking the bank) in Sugar Land? Look no further. Their food is delicious and the owners are extremely passionate about food and wine. Plus - they have an amazing happy hour!!
Highly recommend!   Great service, amazing food and great music!
Wonderful small plate place. Loved it.

name: Escalante's Fine Tex-Mex & Tequila
address: 15933 City Walk, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA
reviews: The beef fajitas were absolutely delicious. Perhaps some of the best I've had. Apart from the usual Mexican rice and various beans that most places serve fajitas with, there was the option to get cilantro rice, fried plantains and grilled vegetables as sides also. For margaritas, we had the RioAzul and Escalante's no. 4, both of which were great on the rocks. Our server, Michael, was attentive and friendly as well.
First time visit and I was very impressed. Really liked the salsa and the food was high quality and everything was served hot. Service was also great.
The food wasn’t well seasoned. The staff and restaurant itself was nice
We loved the food and service was also top notch. This is a great place to come with friends and hang out at the bar during happy hour.
My wife and I  went on Sunday for dinner. The bartender Letty and Armando were awesome. They gave us the best service. The food quality was very good. I will return in the future.

name: Smashburger | Delivery & Takeout Available
address: 2623 Town Center Blvd N #106, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA
reviews:
Dear Assistant Manager, 
Customers who order and pay together should
Not have to mention they would like their food served either at the same time or close together. One person should not receive their food 10 minutes before the other just because one meal takes longer to cook. A NORMAL restaurant would time the cooking of the food appropriately so both meals come out to the customers in close proximity or together. It’s not wise to tell customers the burden of explaining that concept is on them. I won’t be back. This is a second occurrence and there are too many good rating options seconds away to deal with this ridiculous expectation. Good luck.

The shakes are my favorite,our son loves the burger and the fries are really good.Price is fair and the whole vibe is good.
Clean joint and nice staff

I love SMASHBURGER! The smash fries are my go to. I think the meat is well seasoned and I like that you can build the burgers with all your toppings. The milkshakes are also great. The staff are always friendly and tentative.
Thanks for the good customer service from Victoria and for the military discount.  Always appreciated.
Why dear God? Why I ask you, on my knees I beseech you answer me in my time of need. Why are the burgers here so good? Why is the sky blue...that doesn't matter, why are their burgers this good?

name: Chick-fil-A
address: 2330 Hwy 6, Sugar Land, TX 77478, USA
reviews:
Almost every time I order from this location, some aspect of my order is wrong, whether it's forgetting sauce, swapping a regular sandwich for an unlabeled spicy sandwich, or just giving me burnt and dry chicken minis.

On top of that, their breakfast menu is half the normal selection. They don't offer the chicken bagel, the bacon egg cheese, the sausage egg cheese, or the grilled chicken muffin. Just chicken biscuits and minis, which are good, but sometimes I want something different.

I had a great experience here. I arrived close to 2 pm and the place was crowded...inside and drive through. Yet the staff was courteous, and friendly and the lines moved surprisingly quickly, I was able to place my order expeditiously and received my meal to my table very quickly. The chicken strips were rather small they looked bigger on the menu. My fries were cold and soggy but the staff happily changed them for me and gave me some freshly fried... definitely will return to this location.
I have tried several chicken items and they are all good. Service is also good and fast.   This is on my list of "WHAT DO I FEEL LIKE TO EAT". I can hear myself saying "Let's do a chicken run... "

The food is great but needs a more friendly menu for those who have an allergy to peanuts... my Daughter went to doc so we stopped for dinner with her dad before heading home. Customer service was friendly and sweet, but  i hate the only thing I can order from there is the wraps... I do love the avacado dressing

I pull up an the girl offers to help.  I tell her i am there to pick up an order for Joe.  She doesn't say a word and walks off.

The second employee approaches.  I tell her I am there for a pick up for Joe.  She can not find the order.  After a few moments she says pull to the window, they do have it.

I pull forward in Lane 2 and tell the police officer I am.here to pick up an order.  He says did I order?  I tell him, no, I am here to pick one up.  He says I am not understanding him that I need to get back in line.

As I pull around, I tell one of the supervisors I am here to pick up an order, I have already gone through the line, but the cop wants me back in again after I already went through.

He says okay get in line.  My response:  no I am not going to wait again I will just cancel the order.  The employees response: nonchalantly says okay and displays no care to resolve the issue.

If Chic Fil A had a low standard, this was by far the restaurant that aced the low standards exam.  I almost thought I was at McDonalds for a moment with the care free attitude and poor handling of service.

name: Poketo
address: 2228 Texas Dr, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA
reviews: food quality is really good, service is spot on.this is a good hang out spot and good date night atmosphere. You can build your own bowl or pick from a few house special bowls. Either way you cant go wrong.

Staff was very friendly and willing to let us try sauces. I liked that they had kombucha on tap and a condiment bar. The atmosphere was good but I didn't care for the furniture. It moved too easily and wasn't that comfy. Other than that, the portions are really big and the food was good. I would come back.

First off the food is fresh and they give you huge portions! I want to thank McKenzie, the girl who served us. She was very helpful, very patient, and she made the experience that much better! The beet kombucha is so good!!! I would highly recommend this place.
Had my doubts at first but this place was great! They give you a decent amount of fish and had a good amount of toppings. I love the variety. Will definitely be coming back!

I very much enjoyed my meal, but I have no frame of reference: this was my first poke experience. That's why I can't award it a coveted 5 stars.
.
I had the Fire Bowl: fried rice, spicy mayo tuna/salmon, fire sauce, green onion, avocado, cilantro, masago, chili powder, and sesame seeds. I was told it was quite spicy, but it wasn't that hot.  However, it was super delicious.  It was also plentiful.
.
The decor was modern and simple. It was also clean. When the adjacent couple were done and left, the single employee hurried over and cleaned thoroughly and with sanitizer. Impressive.
.
I enjoyed the meal and this easy entry into the world of poke. I look forward to going back.

name: State Fare Kitchen & Bar
address: 15930 City Walk, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA

name: Kilwins Sugar Land Town Square
address: 16029 City Walk, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA
reviews: Amazing place!!!! Best dark chocolate I've ever had (try it melted, it will blow your mind). They've got fair trade chocolate, hot chocolate/drinking chocolate made in store and shredded chocolate (milk and two kinds of dark Peruvian and Dominicana) to make your own. They make their own marshmallows!! Ask to try the sea foam chocolates if you like caramel but not the sticky gooey part. Its crunchy and covered in chocolate and delicious!!!! The owners are very sweet and knowledgeable, they let you taste most things in store to see what you like and honestly there's so much awesome stuff here it's hard to even describe it all. From caramel apples made in store with half a dozen different toppings, sea salt turtles, truffles of assorted flavors, fudge, ice cream, marshmallows dipped in chocolate on a stick, cakes with ice cream, etc etc. There are even gummy bears/worms and lemon drops and malt balls. I could keep going but really you should go here yourself if you like chocolate or sweets at all!!

Amazing selection of chocolates, fudge and delicious ice cream! I also wanted to say thank you for responding to my google maps chat so quickly! They are open and available for curbside pickup. I picked up an awesome looking chocolate ice cream cake today.

Stumbled across this gem after reading the Sugar Land/Missouri City newspaper and I'm super stoked that I did. Tonight was our first time visiting Kilwins and I must say, hands down the BEST ice cream ever! Can't wait for the family and I to go back and try their other gourmet treats.

Nice new addition to Town Square. An assortment of candies from fudge, clusters, chocolate covered pretzels, and more. Variety of ice cream flavors that I would love to try each and every one. They also have ice cream cakes to buy and toppings for your ice cream. Plenty of staff to help who were very friendly. 

Candies are bit overpriced, but they do provide a good serving amount when you get ice cream. Kilwin’s track, Banana fudge pie, and peach were delicious.
Great  people  and a good selection of chocolate and delicacies.

name: State Fare
address: 15958 City Walk, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA

name: The Port of Peri Peri
address: 2625 Town Center Blvd N, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA
reviews:
The appearance is really clean, trendy and well-lit. It felt bright and cheerful walking in. 

You order at the counter and they bring your order to the table. There's a self-serve water station.

The staff is very welcoming and friendly, and so helpful with recommendations. There was a staffer out in the dining area making sure things stayed neat and customers didn't need anything. That was a big plus. The sinks are outside the restrooms, making it convenient to just wash your hands if the delicious sauces get all over. 

The chef came out to assure us that he picked the best lamb chops for our order. Pretty thoughtful! 

Food came out hot. The sides, creamy corn and coleslaw were really good. Two from-the-cooler bottles of their sauces are places on your table. The garlicky one is so good, and the hot sauce is pretty good. 

Maybe it's how they do it, but my chicken was somewhat over-cooked. The four lamb chops were very, very flavorful, but ... not tender. Chinese lamb dishes are so tender, I guess grilled lamb is different. 

Maybe we will give it another try.

I happened to be in Sugarland and decided to eat and ended up at this place, we had no idea about this place.
Let me begin with the ambience of the restaurant. It was well lit, very welcoming and trendy spot. The women who took our order was extremely welcoming, friendly and helpful. She was very informative about the sauce and even let us try it out before we made a decision.
Now on to the food. Hot Damn!! The chicken was delicious. It was flavorful and moist. We got the Hot sauce and it was just the right amount of spicy with still getting the chicken flavor. Rice was aromatic and cooked to perfection. The fries had a lemon  and spice flavor and I couldn't stop eating them. 
10/10 would recommend.

I've had this location on my list for a while, and was delighted to make the visit. Our order was taken by a friendly staff member who made us feel welcomed. For two of us, we got the All-for-one combo which had two quarter pieces of chicken and one regular side. Although the leg & thigh piece was smaller than the breast & wing, I thought it was more flavorful. Overall, I enjoyed my meal and I will recommend a visit.

Excellent chicken,  great concept.  I have tried Nando's Peri Peri in Washington DC and this was quite similar.   You order and pay at the counter and they bring your food out to you. We ordered a whole chicken, corn, cassava fries and a rice bowl.  Everything was delicious. The space was compact but well designed.
The place to be to try the best chicken... I would say better than Nandos. Vegetarian options also available. Must try the hot sauce. Courteous staff and a very pleasant atmosphere.

name: Boulevard Bagel & Cafe
address: 15945 Lexington Blvd, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA
reviews: Excellent experience. Employees are cordial and warm, and are very knowledgeable. They’re willing to help you decide and don’t rush you to order. The atmosphere is also unique and cozy, has cool decorations from exotic places. The bagels and coffee are great, we needed a good bagel shop in Sugar Land! Definitely coming back for more.

Great service!!! I tried their boneless chicken kabob. Words can not describe decribe it, the chicken was cooked to perfection. It practically melts in your mouth, if chicken could be butter, this is it. The rice was so fresh, that I thought it was picked and cut roght in front of me.

I had come here once many years ago, it’s nice to see how well this place has aged. The new owners have put in some work and they have renovated the entire restaurant. They have an expanded bagel and sandwich menu and you’re sure to find something you like. Be sure to stop by, you won’t regret it! The new owners are some very nice people
I’ve been coming to this place since I was a kid. Not only is it always great customer service but the bagels are delicious never disappoint. Steak and Egg is my personal favorite. Highly suggest!
Delicious breakfast bagel sandwiches.

name: MOD Pizza
address: 2735 Town Center Blvd N A, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA
reviews: My first visit to Mod Pizza. I tried the cauliflower crust pizza and I loved it!  Staff was very pleasant and happy to assist in my selection.  I will definitely be back!
I loveeeee Mod! It allows me to eat great pizza and not feel guilty. It's soooo good! Nom nom nom!! 🤤🍕🥰

Staff was great food was good for my first time I really enjoyed the experience though brief they made a great first impression. I was helped by a beautiful lady with a blue shirt whom was very pleasant while manning the front yesterday (which was Monday) 1/20/20 at 3:20 pm there was also another gorgeous lady in who baked my pizza... she had a purple hat on.
Great place, great staff. I have been in here a few times and they are always great. Will come back again and will recommend to friends.
Absolutely love the concept. The team at University Blvd is great. Spicy chicken is the best protein topping!

name: la Madeleine French Bakery & Cafe First Colony
address: 2675 Town Center Blvd N, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA
reviews: So pack but the clean empty tables fast. Food came out quick n hot. Staffs friendly

Like other La Madeleine locations I've been to, service here is typically friendly. Chicken La Madeleine is my usual choice, but I've had a couple of other meals here from full size entrees to sandwiches and soups, and almost always enjoyed them. For delicious healthy food, I will completely recommend.

I had the Quiche, it was ok but not memorable. My hot chocolate was lukewarm, so was my daughter's, she did rave that her butter croissant was excellent. My younger daughter had the apple cinnamon crepe with Greek yogurt was ok, she stated she was hoping her crepe had the filling inside, instead the filling was on top of her crepe. The the atmosphere was a homey feeling the service was okay. I have to say this restaurant will not make the list on my favorite places to go.

Now that we’re doing to go orders, PLEASE PLEASE make sure you’re packing the orders completely and correctly. I had food missing and it’s not even worth me driving all that way back, when I have to work from home, just get those missing items. It’s really frustrating. Please check orders before bringing out to customers. 😡

I completely understand what’s happening right now and I’m a very patient person so when I’m calling to make an order I don’t mind waiting but when they purposely hang up on you 3x!!!!!! Seriously pathetic... a simply please hold on a little longer would be understanding not simply hanging up.

name: Stogies World Class Cigars (Sugar Land)
address: 2278 Texas Dr, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA
reviews: Great cigars, great customer service and great location! Plenty restaurants nearby. You can have a nice meal and then head right to the cigar lounge and relax.  Soft drinks are available for purchase which is very convenient.

I really enjoyed my time at Stogies. The man working offered me a suggestion and helped me pick a cigar. After lighting it up I sat in a very comfortable and relaxing leather chair and slowly smoked it while watching the TV. I would highly suggest this place as a spot to relax and smoke a cigar, or for a place to come with a group to hang out and enjoy each other's company in a cool setting.
good selection of cigars in humidor. friendly to visitors who want to enjoy a cigar without being a member of their exclusive VIP area.
Smoking area looks great. Asked me if i needed help. Good selection/layout.

What a fantastic place, while, I am not a cigar smoker, my husband is a conosieur, and was in heaven. Extensive selection, beautiful, well cared for shop that even sports a smoking lounge and a 24-7 bar and lounge (byob) for members. The clerk was extremely friendly and showed us around and pointed out special cigars, unique to this shop. Great store, great experience!!

name: Imperial Vapor Co. - Sugar Land
address: 2645 Town Center Blvd N, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA
reviews: I’ve visited twice to buy a cartridge for my cape pen and it fit perfectly! The guys are really cool and laid back. When I went the second time, the same guy remembered me from the first time. It felt nice to know that he remembered me. Also, the place is super clean and organized!
Love this place! They always have everything I need and then some. The workers are eager to assist with everything :)
The employees are incredibly friendly and helpful. They will go out of their way to make sure you leave happy. By far the best vape shop in this part of Houston.
The best vape shop I’ve been to. Second to none customer service.
Great house flavors, great customer service, and knowledgeable staff. The place screams chill spot.

name: Taste of Kabab
address: 15945 Lexington Blvd, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA

name: Gepetto's Pizza
address: 15510 Lexington Blvd, Sugar Land, TX 77478, USA
reviews: They have the BEST lunch deals and they wings are AMAZING!!! Well everything is really good. The customer service kinda sucks BUT the food is really good! You just have to overlook the older gentleman who takes your order.

Great little local pizza shop. Affordably priced and quick turnaround on dining in. The calzone was amazing and the garlic bread served with the pasta was wonderful. Definitely worth supporting this family run business.
We've been going to this little pizza place for years and love their pizza.  They have awesome cheesecakes too!

I recently ordered from here and I was very surprised by the overall quality of the pizza which was very good, the delivery was relatively fast and the prices are very reasonable, I would recommend this place over any major chain pizza place

Incredible food! Definitely going back for more. 33 years in business! 
My new go-to Pizza place! 🍕🍝

name: Highlands Neighborhood Park 2
address: Planters Row, Sugar Land, TX 77478, USA

name: Lupitas Mexican Restaurant
address: 3121 Hwy 6, Sugar Land, TX 77478, USA
reviews: My first time here for lunch today.  The food was very good and a nice helping.  The staff was courteous and professional.  I will definitely visit again!
Read the menu before you go:  it's pricey for using so many canned ingredients. The overhead pinatas would be cute if they weren't so faded. Try somewhere else if you want fresh Tex-Mex.
Lunch was very good! Reasonably priced and filling. The service was exceptional.

Cockroach Alert!!! The restaurant was hot as hell and it was only 59 degrees outside. Basically a hot spot for roaches... the man brought us to go boxes with a suprise... A Roach!!! Ugh. Also the waiters need to learn how to speak in a soft voice if they want to use vulgar language.

Our order was taken quickly. Meals were served in big portions. I love Mexican food and have eaten in different restaurants in different places. Sadly, I must say that I didn't enjoy the food here at all, neither did my family. Great service though. I must warn you: Don't order the tilapia - it has an aftertaste!

name: Osaka Japanese restaurant
address: 3149 Hwy 6, Sugar Land, TX 77478, USA
reviews: Awesome sushi!  Very friendly service.
PREJUDICE! GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!

name: Singapore Cafe
address: 3149 Hwy 6, Sugar Land, TX 77478, USA
reviews: Came right before the lunchtime rush. Staff was really friendly and the food was delicious! It's a small space with plenty of seating, and a calm peaceful atmosphere. I look forward to another visit~!

The food is amazing here. Didn’t know about this place for a long time . The food choice is Lott and they do have vegetarian options . Loved the chicken rice and shrimp  mee goreng.. the meat pie was okayish ..the quantity is huge

We been to Singapore few time recently, this food is similar to some of the food there, not as bold but good enough. The lunch special is great, good and reasonable.

We had the Hainanese chicken
Salted fish fried rice
Fried flat noodles with chicken

Met my beloved aunt & uncle there for lunch with my mother - had a great time because of the great people I was enjoying lunch with and the cafe's excellent food and ambience.

Tried five different dishes that I've never had before outside of the normal restaurants we go to and each was a pleasant surprise. Super price during lunch and each dish was fresh, looked good and most importantly, tasted great! Tried the salted fish and chicken fried rice and it was the best I ever had! Had to try to ubiquitous Hainan Chicken & Rice since the name is "Singapore Cafe" and that too was mighty tasty and prepared with love by one of the owners.

So if you got some time during a busy day for lunch, I highly recommend this little mom & pop eatery - support local but you're getting big time food as a bonus!

Am I glad I found this place. There's just number of Singaporean food in Houston and this was highly recommended thru a friend who really know his food. 
We can in on a Thur lunch time, when we just arrived around 11 o'clock, place was very quiet. It got super busy later on and became just bit nosy. 

The owner stayed in different countries in east Asian, so his menu has some influence and dishes from all over those place. I have never been to Singapore however Malaysia. The dishes that from Malaysia was pretty good. Very similar to the one I had there. 

Dishes that we ordered:
1. Sambal Shrimp with Okra: Shrimp is very fresh. I like the texture of the Okra, not too soft. bit crunchy. And the sambal sauce is superb. 
2. Roti: One of my favorite. We finished it in no time. Love the spicy sauce they put on the side for you to dig in. However you can eat with or without. 
3. Hainanese Chicken rice: We had the lunch portion, rice is very good, different than the regular rice and its soaked with chicken broth, smells good.  And the chicken is pretty soft yet  juicy. 
4. Homemade Rib soup: super delicious. They put some Chinese herbs in it and the sweetness of the ribs came out mixed with the herb, very good for your body. 
5. Seafood stir fried flat noodle: I was shocked when I got this dish. It's different from anyone else. It was bit more soupy. I thought it might be weird, but on the contrary very flavorful. 
6. Singapore milk tea: A must try, it taste like the indian pulled tea yet you can taste the Chinese milk tea in it as well. 

I would definitely come back for the Malaysia dishes that's on the menu. I think they would do great on it too.

name: Firehouse Subs First Colony
address: 3135 Hwy 6, Sugar Land, TX 77478, USA
reviews: I highly recommend coming here if you’re ever in the mood for sandwiches! The sandwiches are great, they have a nice drink machine, and many selections of chips/snacks. Also, the staff here are very polite and kind. I will be coming back here!

Yes 5 Stars during my first visit. From the delicious food to the outstanding service! Don't know what to order, just ask Randy. The guy really knows his sandwiches! Had one of the juiciest tender sandwiches ever. Check out my pictures to see Randys creation and how to order it. I would call it the Randinator because it killed the rest of the sandwiches!

This location is always friendly and serving great food 

But long wait times and a hot temp Inside during the summer time bring this to a 4 star review 
Give it a try if you can’t sit down get it Togo
Very cramped location, hard to move around without bumping into someone. Sandwich was ok, soup was nasty. I've had Firehouse Subs before...this one did not make the grade for me.
The staff is super friendly and are quick in getting your order together.

name: Shipley Do-Nuts
address: 3147 Hwy 6, Sugar Land, TX 77478, USA
reviews: MOST OF ALL SHIPLEY DO-NUTS STORE ARE JUST AS DELICIOUS YUMMY .JUST LIKE WHEN THEY FIRST OPEN UP FOR BUNESS WAY BACK IN THE 10970'S AT THE FIRST SHIPLEY DO-NUTS STORE IN HOUSTON TX AREA.  THAT WHERE I HAD MY SECOND JOB AT..WORKING FOR THEM. THEIR JUST AS DELICIOUS AS WAY BACK THEN.

Stop by this morning to grab a quick breakfast for my staff. I love their kolaches! Especially the jalapeño sausage ones! It’s so warm and tasty. It wasn’t really busy when I came in so I got to the counter and ordered right away. Very clean inside! Service was prompt and friendly. Very quick too! Half a dozen oof kolaches, a dozen of donuts and 2 donut holes later.. my staff was well fed and major food coma too! Best feeling :)

After being deeply disappointed at Dunkin on SH 6, I decided to give the Shipley a shot. 
This Shipley location had Bavarian creams and some powered donuts. I asked for three of each for a half dozen. I would have only picked up one or two, but it’s $5 minimum cc charge/debit and I didn’t have cash. 
Tasted fresh enough in the middle of running my afternoon errands and it lasted a few days as we had 1 or 2 a day, for breakfast. 
Recommending this location.
The lady behind the counter was personable.  However, below average quality donuts.

Shipley Do-Nuts is a Texas symbol. Go ahead and mention Krispy Kreme or Dunkin to Texans and they'll be quick to lay you know. . that's not a real donut lol. I love coming to Shipley when I come into town for two reasons: 

1) their hot regular glazed donuts 
2) THE KOLACHES

What I love about their donuts is that they are yeast donuts. According to their website, "The donut that started it all was a glazed yeast donut. This donut has a light interior with a slightly crispy outside and smothered in the traditional glaze or a variety of other toppings including icing, sprinkles, nuts, coconut, and cinnamon-sugar. When eating one of our yeast donuts, you can imagine the sensation of biting into a cloud."

The cloud aspect, is true. When biting into a Shipley donut, you question "what Krispy Kreme?". 

Now the kolaches. To be honest, I never had one until I came to Texas. I didn't even know what one was until my boyfriend introduced them to me a couple years ago. Everyone I go, I get the same one. The jalapeño and cheese one. Amazing every time. 

Our order when my boyfriend and I are together are the same. 
- 3 glazed 
- 3 kolaches 
- 2 bottles of water 
$12

name: Highlands Park
address: Williams Trace Blvd, Sugar Land, TX 77478, USA

name: Highlands Neighborhood Park 1
address: The Highlands Dr, Sugar Land, TX 77478, USA

name: Water’s Way Park
address: 3299-3201 Vista Lake Dr, Sugar Land, TX 77478, USA
reviews: Cute park with lots of scenery and trees.   Ducks galore.   Two playgrounds, one for toddlers and one for older children.  One picnic table but no grill.
Nice little park! Enough to do and the lake is pretty!
A very nice place .. so peaceful.
Wonderful peacefully well mainted, excellent living neighborhood
Beautiful, huge pelicans have been enjoying this park lately.

name: Lost Creek Park
address: 3703 Lost Creek Blvd, Sugar Land, TX 77479, USA
reviews: A nice pleasant place to go for a walk with the family and the dog. Great to see so many folks having a good time and enjoying the weather and the scenery. Loved finding the trails off the main path but will be careful in the summer when the snakes are out.
very nice place for the kids to play and for picnic parties
I really enjoy my morning walk here, it is never  crowded and the people walking are in a friendly mood most days. I am new to this entire exercise thing, feel right at home here.

The walking trail here is great! It is all paved so it is wonderful for strollers. The playground is on the small side and they only have baby swings. But I it makes a good pit stop after walking to let kids run around and burn off some energy.

Liked the older playground equipment, but the new is interesting. Love that there is shade to help keep it from getting to hot. Bathrooms and water fountains and lovely walking paths make this park one of my favorites

name: American Legion Park
address: 4015 Lexington Blvd, Missouri City, TX 77459, USA
reviews: Enjoyed the blue Jay's and turtles and flowers (and of course the lake)!
Caught some nice size cat fish there. Has a nice walking trail around the lake
Good place for relaxing and fishing
This park is a very nice place to visit with family fir a couple hours. The fishing here is pretty good as long as you can find out what they like too bite on. We definitely had a good time here

Really large park with plenty of space to hold numerous family functions and get togethers. Full size Bark Park as well. A lot of water, a lot of trees make this to be a very relaxing environment for any family function.

name: Starbucks
address: 1321 FM 1092 Rd, Missouri City, TX 77459, USA
reviews: This has got to be the best Starbucks I've been to. The espresso is always on point. It never taste burnt and my mocha is always perfect. The staff is incredible. They are so friendly and personable.  The place is always clean any time of day I go in.
This is my home away from home. The staff super friendly and very helpful. The atmosphere fits well for small meetings or Study time.
Greeted me when I came in and the customer service was great. Friendly and helpful  customer service
A lovely starbucks coffee shop. I always find it very clean and shiny. Friendly staff. Good place to hangout and spend time. 📷☕

I don't go to Starbucks often but today I made a stop for some refreshments and to my delight I came across some great staff clean establishment and great service. Will definitely come back in the near future

name: Lexington Square Park
address: Stafford, TX 77477, USA

name: Aishwarya Bakery Indian Restaurant
address: 3008 5th St #6704, Stafford, TX 77477, USA
reviews: The food is constantly well prepared and flavorful, cashiers gives awesome service. I loved how neat it is and ambience. Will visit here again.

Amazing savories from Kerala! We tried Achappam, Uniappam (runs out if you don't show up early enough or call in advance) and Laddu. It truly tastes like what your mother would make at home. :). Must try if you haven't already.
Awesome!   Crispy, fresh snacks and sweets. Very tasty!
Worst customer service.  Ordered food left on the table without any temperature control. People not willing to help. Products don't have any expiration date on it. Won't even go near this place.
This is a good place. Brings  back your memories  about the shack's  in kerala. Great and variety of products!!

name: 5th Refresqueria
address: 1134 Rosas St, Stafford, TX 77477, USA
reviews: Mexican drinks and snow cones with plenty of options to choose from. Their small size cones are like medium to large size so great portion sizes. Great flavors and pricing is great. Highly recommend this place.
Very good,in and out in 3 minutes.
I’ve tried multiple different snow cone places, but nothing beats this place! If you haven’t tried the natural flavors, you should! So good!!!
If you're in Stafford, and you're looking for something fresh and yum, this is the place to go! They have it all. Corn in a cup, snow cones, aguas frescas, and so much more!
They have the best snow cones and they've been there forever!

name: Stafford City Park & Cricket ground
address: 3108 5th St, Stafford, TX 77477, USA
reviews: Great place for cricket in Stafford area.
Beautiful the field is well maintained and clean!
Old park with old playground. Not even a walking path
It's cool
It's Good place to rent for Especial events only thing it needs to ad security/police in case of any i incident.

name: Subway
address: 2120 Texas Pkwy, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: We love hanging out. Yesterday we went to this fine place which friends told us about. We enjoyed a delightful evening there with fine cooking and  an experienced team and an impressive  cuisine. We  added this venue in our phone list  and we will surely come back very soon. We highly recommend.

Completely disrespectful to Uber drivers.

Change your store hours in the Uber app to give time for the driver to make it there before closing and if you close early stop accepting Uber orders.  I tried to pick up a order tonight that you accepted only to drive to a closed restaurant.  Stop wasting drivers time and money.

If you accept a Uber order, fulfill that order.  99% of the time I have to call Uber it’s because of a restaurant's inaction.  I did my job you need to do yours.

We did not like how our sandwiches were thrown together! Maybe it's just me but I take pride in all that I do!! If you don't like serving people find another career. Reason I've never worked in fast food.. I'm not serving anyone.
Nice service, eating here often👌

Clean store. Great customer service.  The guy that made my sandwich made sure he constantly washed his hands and carefully made my sandwich. Only thing was wrong, Oven Roasted Chicken was not ready to serve.

name: 7Spice Cajun Seafood
address: 2240 Texas Pkwy, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: I received subpar service from an employee at the front. She forgot to put in my call in order, then when I came and reordered, she told me i made the mistake and called the wrong number. I verified and called the right number and even went back through the conversation we had on the phone. After being there for an hour I recieved my food and didn't think to check the bag. They gave me the wrong order. I called and spoke with their manager Cynthia who completely changed my mood around. She herself took blame for her employees and even upgraded my order. She was exceptionally friendly and she is a perfect reflection of the great service in this restaurant, not the other employee. Thanks Cynthia....
One of the seafood joints I can go to on the regular!! Their chicken tenders and fries are delicious and so are their shrimp boils with the whole potato’s, sausage, and corn! Finger licking good!
Good food. Fast and friendly service.

Visit today for take out order. Restaurant very clean. The cashier Lucia Chan greeted me as I entered. She was very attentive to my order. She repeated the order and it was ready to go within 10 minutes. I visit this place at least 3 or more times per month and this was some of the best service I've had.
I was pleasantly surprised by the gumbo!! It was good. Spiced right. Nice dark roux. Also had fish and fish. Nice and crispy! Will be back.

name: Wingstop
address: 2240 Texas Pkwy Ste 100, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: Great food and environment. I love the jerk chicken and the curry goat. Mouth watering surprise. You have to check Graces out.
Always great food  and nice staff.

I expected more from this place as it was my first time trying wings here. The bread was very hard. My mom is a Baker and she could tell that the bread was old. The wings where very hard and also tasted old. I love wings but this is very disappointing. If there was a zero start rate I would give this place that rate.☹😡

The wings are not the best, but if you're craving for chicken wings, this might be a good place to go to. I especially liked the original flavor that made them famous. The fries were also good. I personally did not like their Mango Habanero flavor though.
Food was Hot and fresh. Customer service awesome

name: KFC
address: 2210 Texas Pkwy, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: Nothing special to report. The chicken and biscuit were hot and fresh, which is a great improvement for this place. 🙂

Nobody's order was correct even though we only ordered 2 $5 boxes and 1 kids meal. They didn't even get our drink order right and only had small cups. We immediately went to churches. This is exactly why I don't mess with KFC. I took a pic of right now... Church's on the left and KFC on the right. Smmfh. NEVER AGAIN!!
The chicken I bought was not fresh and the taste was bitter. I bought crispy chicken.kindly sell fresh products please
Terrible service. The drive thru is a waste of time, they do not want to be there. God only knows what they do in the kitchen. Save your money!
Asks 4 times for pickles  they asked 3 times in what sandwich  and they still  dint put pickles  in  it . In any of the sandwiches PM

name: Little Caesars Pizza
address: 1947 Texas Pkwy, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: Nice staff but they can't ever get pizzas done in time.  Order online and add 30 minutes to the time it says, you might still have to wait.  They should really just move the automatic pickup machine to the front door and close the lobby.

This is our favorite pizza spot for the kids and when family comes. It used to be pizza hut but they got too pricey and the last time we ordered stuffed crust the cheese inside the crust tasted different so I've ordered little Caesars stuffed crust since our last bad experience. The wait is usually long but when I order online there's no wait. Love this place.

The gentleman taking my order was very friendly. He made sure to let me know how long my wait time was and how much longer I would have to wait. I received 4 hot and fresh pizzas that took about 10 minutes to be ready. The store looked clean and everything looked stocked. The pizzas were delicious! I'll definitely be visiting this place more. I recommend this place.

This is the second time I've come here and there weren't any pizzas ready. I called several times before coming, and though there were 3 staff members in the building no one answered the phone. Today is Monday, 2 pm. I understand things happen, but why there are 3 staff members and no pizzas ready is a bit confusing.
Here's an idea. Have pizzas ready when you're open. It'll help people get our faster. I was sitting in there for about an hour after they opened just to get my pizza.

name: Pizza Hut
address: 2292 FM 2234 Rd, Texas Pkwy, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: If I could give ZERO stars, I would. The girl that took my order was really friendly and took the time to tell me the different deals going on within the store, which I appreciated. Unfortunately, my card declined and I had to call back the store to give them my other card, no biggy. HOWEVER, when I called back the store, the manager was EXTREMELY rude towards me. I understand that I placed my order about 15 minutes before they closed, but you DON'T treat the customer rudely. I've worked for Pizza Hut before for almost three years, we believe in BLAST, and we always treated the customer with the utmost respect, no matter WHAT time it was after we opened, or minutes before we closed. Even the driver that delivered my order was friendly and I appreciated him being honest when I asked him questions about who took my payment information. I tried to look past the manager being RUDE towards me, but once I got inside and looked at my order, I was EXTREMELY disappointed. The bacon cheese stuffed crust was NOT how it should have been, extremely greasy and the bacon cheese cylinders were not proportioned the way they should have been. I specifically asked that my wings be DOUBLE FRIED and they obviously were not fried twice as I asked, and therefore were soggy and not crunchy they way they should have been; had they been DOUBLE FRIED. Even the cookie I ordered wasn't fully cooked and still tasted doughy. Again, I get it, I ordered roughly 15 minutes before closing time, but that still isn't an excuse as to why I was treated rudely by the manager taking my payment information, and why my order wasn't fulfilled the way I asked. I don't plan on ordering here EVER again after my experience tonight and recommend anyone considering ordering here NOT to at night.. prepare to be disappointed and treated rudely by the manager.

two days ago was our first time we went to this fine restaurant. But It is absolutely not the last. We passed a splendid evening with the courteous service, with the high quality  food and booze and with the decent payment. We will definitely go back there in a short time.

Please send them some help.  Carry out board doesn't coordinate with actual READY TIMES.  Appears to be doing their best... but overwhelmed, understaffed ? Not sure but wait time is beyond reasonable 4 orders placed on line.

Have never reviewed any restaurant before, but considering how disappointing this experience was, here I am giving them 1 star. Zero if it were possible. Definitely recieving 2 thumbs down!! Don't even need to explain why after reading all of the comments below.
40 minutes late. Wrong pizza. Overcooked. Barely warm  I'll never order from this Pizza Hut again.

name: Timmy Chan Restaurant
address: 2015 Texas Pkwy, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: It's food I grew up with and they have a handy drive through service.
Great prices and a very pretty lady taking your  order. I ordered 3 lunch specials of Beef and broccoli. Hello to you pretty lady.

I was so excited to try this location because they have flavored wings. We ordered the lemon pepper wings with fried rice and 2 koolaids....The koolaid was absolutely amazing. It reminded me of childhood. The lemon pepper seasoning was amazing, however the chicken had an odd taste to it as if it was almost expired. It was very strong and dry. We threw it out versus saving it for later. I will give them one more try whenever I decide to have a cheat day.

I ordered a orange chicken an then a general Toso. They put orange sauce an hot sauce on my general chicken.When I asked for a refund the lady told me not to come back because she don't have time to remake things.

I love everything about Timmy Chan! Always been my go to when I'm in Houston and canget there. Lunch specials are so cheap, and the food never disappoints. If you want real Chinese go somewhere else, if you want wings and rice, this is the spot.

name: Burger King
address: 2207 Farm-To-Market 2234, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: Food was good but I have an allergy to raw onions and told them and the girl making the burgers NEVER changed her gloves or cleaned the area that she was making the other burgers in.
Awesome food. Clean restraunt. Beet the heat!

The Double Whopper was a excellent burger and hot fresh fries and chocolate milk shake it hit the spot the service was really fast and fair cleanly restrooms. Will be back for sure. $1.00 Ice Cream Cones for sure.

Very disappointed on Burger King Qc. Its Horrible !
I order thru Drive thru Grill Chicken Sandwich for my wife. Went Home sat Down ready to eat my Original Chicken Sandwich, when the wife open hers Grill Chicken Sandwich it was plain i didn't order plain , but what surprised me that chicken was not chicken it was hard like cardboard, so piss 😠 so of course the dine in its closed , i waited in the drive to go and complain.  I ask where is the grill charbroiled chicken Sandwich  ya use to sell and manager told this is it . Then he told me sorry for inconvenience but short handed, Thats is not my Problem I replied no excuse !  Thats why Chipotle and Chick-fil-A Got you Guys Beat! Shame on You Burger King You guys sell frozen foods and just heat it up in the bar Grill!
Get Your Act together and Start Selling Fresh Foods!
Fast, convenient and friendly service. Food is pretty good

name: Church's Chicken
address: 1949 Farm-To-Market 2234, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews:
FOOD WAS TRASH!!!
I  drove 8.5 miles to this location because l had 3 horrendous experience at the store right down the street. This location wasn't any different, the food was absolutely horrible!  I just threw it in the trash to include the Sprits which was only carbondaled water.. It appeared to have been recooked (more than once) and it was still cold. It took about 10-12 minutes to return home.
WARNING. CHECK YOUR FOOD BEFORE YOU LEAVE!!!
With everyone (Pandemic) going  to "Pick Up or Delivery Only"  a lot of establishments are forgetting product quality.
Very rude customer service! Smoke covered the dining area, probably from poor ventilation. Awful place!
Nice people but they wouldn't discount the chicken anymore even when we ordered 100 pieces! Love Church's chicken but this order was for a church function!!!
A week of this place... Very friendly with the exception of a couple times i had to check the attitude, afterwards smooth sailing. The food was fresh hot and delicious everytime!

This place is HORRIBLE!!! The customer service for the drive thru clerk was simply pathetic..... The rice was greasy and watery.... who makes cajun rice watery.... that must mean you dont know how to cook rice outside of your job... sad! Then when I looked at the chicken it was friend extra hard and half way burnt. She looked like she had an attitude when I told her to just refund me my entire order..... As long as I come to this side of town I WILL NEVER COME BACK TO THIS LOCATION

name: Mario Bato
address: 1947 Texas Pkwy, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA

name: Brentwood 3 Seafood Market
address: 1941 Texas Pkwy, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: The food here is great! I've been a customer since the mid 90's growing up in Missouri City. They are clean and food is fresh. You won't be disappointed. I get the shrimp, chicken or beef fried rice every time!
Sorry place. I go inside and notice cash only. So I am thinking my debt card is just as good as cash. The lady work there, was like cash only. And that was my first and last time going there.☹
Excellent!!! Good prices, but its a cash only and take out!!
I've eaten here in the past and have never left a review. I worked in Missouri City total of 10 years and know this as a city favorite. Friendly service and great food. No complaints here!
Great food!

name: Muy Pizza Houston LLC
address: 2292 Texas Pkwy, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: Pizza is decent for the price. Staff can be rude. Long wait times for hot n ready pizza.!!
Tasteless pizza ...yuck !

name: Grace's Cafe
address: 1909 Texas Pkwy, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews:
IF YOU HAVE A TASTE FOR CARRIBEAN FOOD COME HERE ...QUIET TASTEFUL SPOT...
COME THRU FOR SOMETHING DIFFERENT THING THAN FAST FOOD.

Impressive collection of American Traditional foods. This is a breakfast and brunch restaurant with comfort foods. Lost of online people give opinions about this restaurant. So many customers check in to this restaurant every week. Foods are so yummy.
They offer an awesome variety of fresh food. I like eating here. Employees are always very kind, pricing is convenient and the spot is always neat.
This spot is worth giving a shot. They serve big portions for reasonable prices. Constantly neat and with fantastic atmosphere. Highly recommended.
I finally ordered something besides jerk chicken and this dish was worth the 30 minute wait for the cabbage to be finished.

name: Dairy Queen Store
address: 1799 Farm-To-Market Rd 2234, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: Manager was at drive thru window taking payment with one glove on (which is fine). However, she wiped her nose mulitple times never once using any sanitizer or stopping to go wash her hands. Prime example of why I cook so much and rarely eat out!
Chichen basquet it's the best.
Sat there 30 minutes to get my food. I do not recommend this place if you want you food in a timely manner
Great service. Just make sure your French fries fries are fresh!
Love this place! I take my kids here. The staff is always nice, the place is kept clean, and the food is always on point 👍

name: Tea'ze Daiquiri Lounge
address: 1975 Texas Pkwy, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: Late night setup because another event fell through. There was a young lady and man behind the counter, both we're nice and service was quick. The gentleman even took the time to explain the drinks and made recommendations. I do not remember what I ordered, but I know it was delicious because I finished it. Try them out!

The drive thru was fairly quick and the lady at the counter was very friendly. The mix of strawberry and Pina colada was pretty good. However, it is on the expensive side with a gallon costing around $46. The 16 oz was around $9 with tax. A $10 minimum for credit card purchases, so make sure you have cash on you.
Very quick drive thru experience. The lady Manning the window was wonderful. The drink was delicious

What can anyone say... this daiquiri lounge has been literally everyone in mo-city’s go to place for a good time. Staff is helpful and enjoyable to be around with. Environment is peaceful and chill to be with. And the daiquiris are better then you think. A must go to if your new, or visiting

Strong drinks, great price, and awesome service. We were on a girls trip for my friends birthday at this place did the trick. They were friendly and nice, drinks hit the spot and they gave us free jello shots and the birthday girl a free goodie lol thanks for being a part of our trip!!

name: Hunters Glen Park
address: 1340 Independence Blvd, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: This is a nice park for my older kid.... The splash pad and playground is nice... but I also have a 2 year old and the playground is way to high for him...which means I have to follow him around making sure he doesn't fall from all the openings and the 10 foot slide...smh

I would advise women to be careful at this park. Over time, more and more undesirable people frequent it to sit while they drink and smoke. I was verbally harassed by someone there yesterday that did not want to take no for an answer, and it made me very uncomfortable. Walk with mace just in case you need it.

Good size park with basketball court, playscape, splash pad , soccer field, and football goals too. Lots of space to roam around. They also have a public restroom that was ok at best for cleanliness but it was fine. Plenty of parking for gatherings and families

Park is really nice and huge! Needs to be maintained more often with the landscaping! Dog poop on the trail often because of residents not picking up behind their animals. Needs stations with waste bags! Other than that its really quiet and there are nice friendly people along the trail!
Cool City Park! Shaded basketball courts and playground, and waterpark, but only open during summer

name: Danny's Crawfish & Seafood
address: 7046 W Fuqua St, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: We enjoy hanging out. Last night we arrived in this fine place which friends told us about. We enjoyed a delightful experience there with first-rate food and a nice team and  a professional  chef. We put this fine restaurant in our list  and we will certainly come back very soon. We warmly recommend.
I absolutely love this place, food is great, prices r great, service is great.. It's a must try, especially their shrimp boil in garlic butter sauce, medium spicy..

Amazing and satisfying. This was an absolute experience. I was so thoroughly please with the class and courtesy as well as friendliness of the staff. The entire meal was an experience and left my taste buds wanting for. Highly recommend.
Great place to eat something when in a hurry. Their customer service is rapid, rates are convenient, fantastic mood. Highly recommended
Love it. The place clean

name: Blue Ridge Library WIC Center
address: 7007 W Fuqua St, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: Went to this office today with an appointment. This was my first time here. It is located inside of the Blue Ridge Library and there is plenty of parking. The building is easy to locate from the street with a wic logo on the front next to the library's name. It was quiet and calm on early Thursday morning compared to other offices I've been to which is perfect if you have a newborn or healing from csection. They are open on every Thursdays, then every 1st and 3rd Friday some Saturdays as well. The staff are kind and friendly. Make see sure you have everything they ask you to bring. The wait time was reasonable and nothing to complain over. I would highly recommend this location and its in the library so you can read a hood book while you wait which is a bonus. Please like this if you found it helpful

Its close to where I live. Its literally walking distance from my house like 5 to 10 minute walk. The staff there is very lovely and the wait time is very reasonable. I would recommend everyone go there. Its located inside the Blue Ridge Library. Easy to find. They are open every Thursday and Friday but open every 1st and 3rd Saturday of the month. So go ahead and make Blue Ridge WIC office your new WIC office. You're going to love it.
They always take care of me
They are rude

name: Stimley-Blue Ridge Neighborhood Library
address: 7007 W Fuqua St, Missouri City, TX 77489, USA
reviews: I love this library! It's small and family oriented, so nobody really shhooshes my kids to be quiet...except me😀. They have the best staff ever! From the permanent staff to the volunteers. They are caring and always willing to help. Mr. Dru is super nice and helpful, and the kids love that he's so funny. I love that he says what he means and means what he says. Honesty goes a long way and there should be more people like Mr. Dru in charge. He does a great job at welcoming and getting to know the kids and families that go to the library. Even though this particular library doesn't have the books I was looking for, I can still place a hold on them and the library that does have it sends it here. So it all works out. Overall, it's a great library!

One of my favorite libraries we've been to in Houston. It was very kid friendly, with toys and a good selection of books, plus a very friendly staff! They encouraged my kids (ages 4 and under) to play and learn, and we felt very comfortable there. It's a bit further than other libraries, but I'm sure we'll be going back!

Stimley Blue-Ridge Library staff is friendly and helpful. They have been supportive with our non-profit organization with ensuring we have a meeting space whenever we need it as well as reasonable accommodations to ensure our organization have what we need when we are providing our programming to the youth and families in the community. Ms. Jacqueline is always ready to assist us when she is there, she is knowledgeable and always wearing a smile. Mr. Drew is also nice and helpful. We look forward to continue building  our rapport with the community and this library branch as we continue to raise awareness on abuse, violence, and bullying in our communities.
Great place to go.My kids  have fun and amazing  staff

THE FAMILY IN COMMUNITY  EVENT WAS  AWESOME. WILLOWRIDGE MIGHY EAGLE BAND AND DANCERS THEY PUT ON A BIG  PERFORMANCE ON THE PARKLOT.  THERE WAS FREE FOODS AND GIVEAWAYS. I HAVE A AWESOME TIME AT THE EVENT

name: Bayou Eggrolls and More
address: 5530 W Ridgecreek Dr suite 600, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: First time it is real good something different and delicious I tried all of the egg rolls must return
The best eggrolls I ever had.
Best I've ever tasted took egg rolls to another level
The  Best in the city and on the trailrides!!
There isn't a place i know of that sells such delectable (egg rolls) lupas!! Very friendly staff and the owners are always making sure your order is fresh and correct!!

name: La Roca #3
address: 15838 S Post Oak Rd, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: DO NOT GO TO THIS DIRTY RESTAURANT! THEIR FOOD IS NEVER COOKED FRESH... BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE AND LACK OF CLEANLINESS!!!!
The food doesn't taste that well but good service.
For exquisite Salvadoran food in my opinion is one of the best in South West Houston area,from pupusa to tamales,soups,drinks awesome!!
Good Salvadorian Food!! Great prices.. Very nice customer service.

She kept walking to the back to grab who knows what then she would disappear. Customers just cut in line because they know cashier which is irritating. I rather drive to the one on bissonnet than to come to this one.

name: hK Seafood and Wings
address: 15834 S Post Oak Rd, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: Price was decent. Portion was large. Flavor was ok. My food was burnt.

I’ve tried wings, fish, shrimp, and shrimp fried rice. Everything flavored well, proportioned well. Don’t care for the shrimp much, they’re large shrimp cut in half and sold as full when doing a combination plate. Only reason I don’t give 5 starts due to ordering my food and waiting on them to fix credit card machine, had to leave and get cash, and come back. Called to have food prepped since the process took 45 mins of my lunch, nothing was given for accommodations. However I do like the food and will still most likely return but with cash. Lol
I love the food there. My favorite is the fried Tilapia. Food is well seasoned, good portions and fair pricing.

Great cheap food. It is fairly run down but it's in an older neighborhood area. The owner is very sweet and attentive. The crawfish is delicious but small. Chicken wings were delicious, fried just right.
Ordered sweet and sour chicken but they gave me something drifferent told the lady to correct the order she refused her answer was new sweet and sour chicken.. Poor service

name: Taqueria Jalisco
address: 15818 S Post Oak Rd, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: Food came out fast and hot. Delicious flavor. Great spice level.
Super good Mexican food. Probably won't have 5 stars on Yelp or a line of hipsters out the door. Try their fajita gordita or barbacoa tacos.
I've been going for years here. Def a place to go for during a special occasion but if you don't like a busy place then try the weekdays.
Taqueria Jalisco serves quite a few items that I love. Some of my  favorites are the mini tacos, beef or chicken caldo, and these beef enchiladas.
Hot homemade tortillas and fresh delicious salsa. Quality food at a reasonable price. Would highly recommend.

name: Le Seafood
address: 15948 S Post Oak Rd, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: Pretty delicious! Loved the Whiting. Did find a few bones!
The food was great far my parents. Just was bland. But it was enjoyable 🙂
Decent prices and good portions. But food is rather bland.
Good, Clean, Efficient.  The prices are reasonable.  My favorite place to eat when on that side of town. We love it!
Great food and they are open now❤️

name: Subway
address: 15901 S Post Oak Rd Unit A, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: This place is great I always have perfect food every time with no issues. I have been going here for about a year and I have never had any problems. The Philly cheese steak is amazing and any dish you order will be perfect made to order
I love the service! My sandwich is always made with care!!!
Manager is always nice and ppl orientated love going to this location
Good service, nothing else to say.
Nothing special here it's a sandwich chain.  Good for a quick and somewhat heathy bite.

name: Little Caesars Pizza
address: 15917 S Post Oak Rd, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: They dont answer phone it would help to place a order so you dont wait long waits .i. have called many before this the only location that dont answer phone
They don't know how to make a extra most bestest smh.

Reason I'm giving it a star review is because the cashier at the front is extremely rude. Like he doesn't really acknowledge you're there. My advice to management is to get better staff who are young adults not teens or to train them better, they will scare customers away. I do not recommend this place. this is my third time coming here  and every time the food has been cold and there has been a small selection of pizza .the staff is rude and is not worth it, there are better locations.
They're fast and make the pizzas nicely. The staff are also nice even when there's a rush.
I went to get a pizza for my boys tonight and the pizza is beyond terrible and it’s cold and the wings I order barely had sauce this is very unacceptable you guys need to do better as a team.

name: Creole Frenchie's Fried Chicken
address: 15901 S Post Oak Rd, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: i’ve been coming to this place for years so it kills me to say that the quality of the food has dropped tremendously.. i ordered a 3 piece wing & by the looks of it i thought it was fried fresh... i got home just to see the chicken looked like it was dropped back into the grease just so it can seem fresh... it was dry and little to no meat and very burnt. avoid this establishment
Cant never go wrong with the chicken tenders and the rice! Friendly staff and good food, been coming here for the past 10years!

When i ordered i literally said i would wait on fresh chicken. When I took it back because the chicken wasn't hot all they did was drop that same chicken back into the grease for a minute  or 2 and gave it back to me. It was disgusting and super greasy. Will NOT be returning. Back in 2000 this place used to be really good. Not anymore
Great fried wings. Been twice now and have yet to be disappointed.
Love there fries and shrimp fried rice I think everything is good they always have specials or really good combos is a must try on my opinion

name: Super Dave's BBQ
address: 15825 S Post Oak Rd, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: I love super daves bbq. Catering too. Feeds a whole crew.
Excellent place to get some great BBQ.  The service at Dave’s was supper. Highly recommend if your in the area.
I love the bbq. Links, ribs are my favorite. Chicken is okay. Dave is nice and very talkative. 😊
DELICIOUS RIBS AND POTATO SALAD, AND THE SAUCE WAS ON POINT.
Best bbq on post oak

name: Kelly Pupuseria
address: 5446 W Ridgecreek Dr, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: Great Salvadoran food for decent prices. The pupusas are hand packed and are really tasty. Come here to try something new!
Great pupusas!!! My daughter and I love it plus it's so near our house!!
The pupusas are simply delicious! These are the best pupusas I have ever tasted!
Very very good pupusas. Will definitely be back soon.
Great authentic Pupuseria!! They have all kinds of pupusas that others dont have !!! Como Pepperoni con quesso y Hongos con quess mmm que Rico!!!

name: Taqueria Los Potrillos
address: 15622 S Post Oak Rd #4, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: Food was good and fast service.

I live on the North side of Houston but I drive to the southwest when I can just for their menudo... I eat menudo weekly, never miss a weekend and this place hands down has the best tasting menudo I've tasted so far.... sorry grandma lol
Food was okay. I feel like it needs more flavor.
Good food

I live near this location and it has the best menudo! The food is good and it’s a small restaurant but the ladies are real nice and the food and drinks are good and authentic. Everyone is nice and friendly and a good place for some delicious Mexican food.

name: Sonic Drive-In
address: 15917 S Post Oak Rd, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: If I was able to give no stars with a review would be appropriate. I’ve been here 3 time in the past month first time in the morning service was poor. Second late night staff was fighting with customer’s so my order was not processed after waiting left. Third time not yet close 10 minutes till closing didn’t get anyone on the speaker. While Cookie Monster was sitting outside on the phone same person fighting last time.

This experience was horrible...I ordered the carhop special...they gave me me someone else burger....I go back to switch it, they te me the system is down, I just needed the correct burger. Finally they come get the old burger go in make a new one and come back out and it's still wrong, go back tried again. This time I waited until I was home and checked the burger and it was still wrong and it was horrible. They gave me an old burger. Then it's still not the carhop special.

The service is very very slow. Then they get everyone else’s order out but ours. This location is the only one near my in laws house so I have to come. I usually wait longer than 25+ minutes or more. Then the young lady that works at Sonics made sure she told the group of kids that she was going to make sure they would never eat here and had a couple of back and forth words. She came up to our vehicle and asked for our order and my husband told her and she said that wasn’t ours. Come to find out 30 minutes later it was, then said my husband hadn’t said what she had just repeated. She was nice and sweet. So customer service wasn’t bad!

I only stopped by because it was convenient, otherwise I don't normally frequent this particular Sonic. I was reminded why I stopped patronizing this Sonic. I was told that my debit card was declined. I called to get the balance in my bank account and I had more than enough money. The server went back in and it was approved. The food was just ok. The tator tots were not hot/ fresh and the burger was not the best.

If I could give zeros stars I would because within this past mont I’ve came here multiple times and they have told me there not serving ice cream at the moment and also they took a very long time to take my order in the drive thru I’m very disappointed

name: Lecaroz Bakery
address: 15815 S Post Oak Rd, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: Love the selection of sweet bread,  and cakes. I have also eaten some of the platters. Good food and good prices.
Thank you for being opened
Delicious, fresh baked goods. Try the delicious gelatinas. They make any event special. They are one of a kind pieces of edible art. The tacos are also delicious.
Amazing Bakery! AMAZING! JUST AMAZING!! Have not tasted any pan or pastel that tastes better than here! The staff is really friendly, and nice. Will be coming here often!!!!
Good people great bread good food...very cozy place

name: Shell
address: Hiram Clarke Rd, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: Not a bad place limited spots mostly local truck parking an $10 per nite also has $10 shower available
Stupid Bad Service in this Gas Station
This store I not 24hour i went 12:30 and noone answered or came to window
Clean, but no hot food?
Really good and convenient  place to get your regular items. Moreover, fuel rewards are aspiring.

name: Kray Cray Cajun House
address: 4160 S Sam Houston Pkwy W, Houston, TX 77053, USA
reviews: Best crawfish in the shadow creek ranch area. We’ve tried a lot, but this place has the best ones! 6 stars out of 5! Always fresh, juicy, spicy and salty enough!
Nice restaurant for a quick but decent meal. Served hot. Good flavor. Place is also clean and fresh. Will the back. They also have a drive thru.

I have been a customer since crawfish season 2019. I was there once or twice a week for at least 10 lbs of crawfish. I've been there several times this year, but the last few weeks have been disappointing. The crawfish are small and dirty. They are not rinsing them properly before boiling. They are even saltier than before. I don't know what is going on there now. I will not be going back. I used to drive past many other crawfish places to get there but, I will have to find me another crawfish spot.

Best crawfish I ever I had I thought I made the best these guys got me beat wow amazing flavors. Everything beheld flacor from the claws head to tails yummy yummy. I could easily eat a whole sac of your bugs flavored!!!
VERY NICE & CLEAN RESTAURANT. I ORDER FROM HERE @ LEAST 2X P/WEEK! HAD TO SLOW DOWN 😂😂. GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE W/HAPPY SMILING FACES FROM THE LADIES WHO SERVE YOU... 3 THUMBS 🆙👍👍👍

name: Houston Humane Society Pavilion
address: 3330 S Sam Houston Pkwy W, Houston, TX 77047, USA

name: Green Mill Social Club
address: 630 S Sam Houston Pkwy W, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: This place was very nice, sexy and well ran. If I had to add or change anything it would be the sell of food. We had an amazing time here at a private party.

I've been here twice so far, and enjoyed both visits. It was packed on my first visit, and as a result had to use an adjacent paid parking lot. My recent Saturday night visit was however different with an ample amount of free parking available. The vibe was lively and upbeat, with a crowd of different age groups who were all having a great time. The drinks were good and strong as well.

Nice hangout spot for the mature adult. Old school music. Great pricing and excellent customer service. Plentiful seating. The food sold out front is amazing. Large portions. Large flavors and well worth the price.  Nice place for a relaxing evening out.
I went for a birthday party.  It was nice and more of a lounge setting.  CLASSY.  The DJ tailored the music to the crowd. I would go again.
Friendly and clean environment. The owner went well above to offer such a wonderful place to the public!

name: Tom Bass Regional Park
address: 3452 Fellows Rd, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: Its a great park. You can walk, ride your bike on the trails after certain times, you can fish, feed the ducks, lots of picnic tables, pavilion availabe for a reasonable amount. They have wonderful police officers to protect you and very nice maintenance workers.

Go running here all the time. Track is asphalt not soft. Very little of it is shaded. Still the park has an amphitheatre, lots of pavilions; a golf course,  a demonstration area and is very well maintained. There are several playgrounds for the kids and a nature walk on the other side of Cullen. Well done.

Very diverse park. You can do almost anything you can think of as far as outdoor activities. It is very busy on Saturdays, so come early for a good spot. The tennis courts are great, it's rare to find free and open courts in this area. 
Lots of police presence. Very safe here.
I was there for a walk a thon, it was a GREAT park for the walking & all the other activities as well.
Good dog park although grass needed mowing. Nice short walking path.

name: Circle K
address: 3331 S Sam Houston Pkwy E, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: Nice employees and well maintained station. Police are even frequently around which makes it feel safer at night.
3 out of 3 pumps that i tried it didn’t work and sent me inside, there a very moody girl was the cashier. TERRIBLE service. Don’t even try it!
When you first walk in the staff greets with a hello. The store is very clean! Restroom is also very clean! Like coming to this store.

Credit card machines constantly go down. Their solution it to use their ATM machine... that charges big withdrawal fees. 

Place is decent, but you are better served to go to the new Shell next door.

Very rude store manager not a place to go because it's a apartment building right across the street and kids come in and out they want to leave all of your belongings with them I hate stores like this. There is a officer that's their all the time if someone is stealing why it's he taking people to jail if u have video not just a feeling with out proof. Me and Amy will not be spending any more money with them and if I was u reading this I wouldn't.

name: Shell
address: 3405 S Sam Houston Pkwy E, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: why do they put the price different ????
Great Mom & Pop store! They work with you and give you discounts.
Tire air pump vandalized.
Good place with great services
Great staff!

name: Burger King
address: 3405a S Sam Houston Pkwy E, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: I am so loving the new Impossible Burger. Years ago Burger King tried a veggie  burger that was not  nearly as good as this one. When dresses like a full Whopper you really can't tell the difference! So good I had it twice in one week. However  the second time I did remove the top bun

This Burger King is attached to a gas station. Been here a few times for lunch. Never had issues with employees not being friendly but the wait at the counter has been longer then desired. The food has come out in a timely manor. The dining area has always needed to be cleaned, dirty tables, floor, drink area. The kitchen looks to be the cleanest area. I like the open kitchen. I hate being charged for a water cup when I’m buying a $5 burger.
The burgers turned out good can't complain.
This restaurant is a good place to go watch a game or just enjoy the superior quality of a burger! If you need to put a quick charge on your phone this us the place to do it!
I love Burger King. But this was cold whopper

name: Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen
address: 3503 S Sam Houston Pkwy E, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews:
Pulled into the drive thru & they asked us to wait a min, which no worries.. they then took our order. 2 chicken sandwich meals. 

They have us pull forward and after a few minutes (there’s no one inside or in the drive thru but us) the lady at the window says they don’t have any food ready & it will be 7-10 minutes. 

They opened an hour ago.. AND it wouldn’t have been a big deal if they told us upfront. Not after 10-15 min of just sitting there.

Received food poisoning from this location. Me and my 2 yrs old spent the night in the er. Do not eat here. I assumed because they were new, I wouldn't have this problem. Never again. I keep calling to get in touch but they won't answer phone.

There is a rude woman in the drive through window named Maria who is entirely incompetent. Three times now she has taken my order, and three times she has messed it up, even after repeating it back to me. She has messed up drinks, sides, and the contents of the boxes. This location is going downhill fast. Avoid entirely.
Very rude and terrible customer service. The guy In the drive thru was rude and food was not fresh . Will definitely not be coming to this location ever again.
Just ordered the 8pc Buttermilk Shrimp combo, only 4 of the shrimp were actual whole shrimp the other 4 were tails covered in batter. Why someone would put that in an order is beyond me.

name: Fresh Donuts
address: 3503 S Sam Houston Pkwy E, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: I've been coming here since they 1st opened and i love it! Everything is always fresh daily and i drive from Katy Texas just to have the best bakery/donuts ever made😊

BRISKET KOLACHES!! Stumbled into this excellent place on accident. I am glad I did, their Brisket Kolache is amazing and they have a wide variety of beverages. There customer service was very friendly and welcoming!
Awesome place for quick donuts and breakfast sandwiches, full variety of baked goods. Coffee services and fantastic friendly staff!
Delicious! Super friendly staff! Thanks for coming to my neighborhood!
Very delicious donuts and kolaches worth giving a try if you haven't yet stopped. The customer service is impeccable and the bread is soft and fresh.

name: Sonic Drive-In
address: 4020 S Sam Houston Pkwy E, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: On this visit, I just found out that they have an inside dining section after all of this time. I always use the drive-thru and somehow noticed the entrance on this visit. It isn't  that big, but it is good to know for those that just want to hang out for a little while and enjoy their food and drinks. The staff was having a good time interacting and laughing. I am a firm believer that you should be able to work at a place where you can be in a positive environment. The young lady welcomed me with a smile and had my order ready in no time. This was definitely a good experience.

Horrible, I asked for the $2.99 which is a cheese burger with lettuce and tomatoes and cheese. I wanted it without cheese. What I got was meat, cheese and bread . See pictures. I was very disappointed.
