Simple service!! Asked for one type of drink and got a whole different drink. Then got charged extra for a Slushie that they called fresh fruit.. This is why I say " It's Okay ". No need to argue with people about my food. I will not return to that location. Problem Solved.
I go here everyday to get a route 44 Diet Coke for my mother. The staff here makes me feel like family. Literally they do.
Had a number one with tots and ched r peppers.. everything was good but the tots seemed like they kinda had been there a feww before I ordered but everything else was good

name: Church's Chicken
address: 14455 Cullen Blvd, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews:
Spicy chicken was pre cooked and reheated as well as dried out from being under the heat lamp 
Peppers was good though
Barely cooked fries. Staff is such in a hurry that they barely cook the fries. Check your fries when you get your order.
Chicken was fresh, hot and crispy. Wait time was not long. Will visit this location again.
Nice quick service and chicken was fresh
Nice and clean place to eat!   Good job....

name: Shell
address: 14455 Cullen Blvd, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: Tried to use this place 6+ times. Every time there is something broken or out at the pump. They just cant seem to keep things operational. Drives me nuts and wastes my time. Gave up trying, there is enough other and better options in the area now. Wont waste my time at this one.
Good fresh food
Questionable meter running, filled with 18 gallons yesterday but think it should be 17-17.5 gallons based on experience from previous fills at other stations. Will try stay away.
Prices are a little high but great service

If I could give a negative star rating I would. I just had my debit card get charged for 2 $95 purchases that I didn’t make there. I used it inside this past Saturday so it’s obvious that someone who works there did it.

name: Daiqritexpress
address: 4001 S Sam Houston Pkwy E, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: The Daiquiris are great the appetizers and food are good an all-around great experience

name: Panda Express
address: 4041 S Sam Houston Pkwy E, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews:
The people that work the drive through make ordering the most simple things a total headache!! I truly hate coming to this location. The girls taking the orders seem to NEVER understand what your are asking for and it’s so frustrating. It’s either that, or they wait until to you order to tell you what they DONT have! Then the food is dried out or overcooked. AVOID THIS LOCATION and go to the on on 288 near Sam’s Club! 
Their reviews are absolutely a reflection of this location.

Went to this location for the 1st time and had the worst experience ever. This location just opened about 3 months ago and when we got our food there was a roach in it. The roach looks like it was cooked with the food. When i took the food back and asked for my money back the managers asked if i wanted anything else. Once again roach looks like it was cooked with the food! Never again going back!!! Wouldn't let me post review without choosing a star

AVOID IT! I’m not a person that goes out of their way to write bad reviews but this restaurant is HORRIBLE! Got really bad food poisoning and staff is so rude. They always mess up the order or forget to give us the sauces. You would think the experience would be good since it just open a couple months ago. I should of definitely read the reviews.
I’ve been here a few times and yesterday would be the last. I got food poisoning from the Beijing beef. The staff is also rude, horrible customer service . Avoid this restaurant at all cost!
Very bad. Will never come here again. Very stingy with food. Asked for a order of shrimps. Got 5 shrimps for 5$ .

name: Happy China Cafe
address: 4001 S Sam Houston Pkwy E #135, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: Great food. Also, tastes fresh.  They do not speak to you, but they are friendly. Great for lunch. They get your food pretty quick too. Prices are good.
The food here is soo good. They are very quick to serve.  Really nice and friendly. Clean restroom. All tables are clean and ready for you to sit anywhere you please atmosphere is quite.

Very fresh American Chinese food.  The veggies are always crispy and it is made per order.  When I go to Panda Express, the veggies have been sitting there for long time and they are soft and soggy.   I also love ordering the special dishes like Tofu on sizzling plate, Salt and Pepper shrimp.  My 2 favorite dishes.  The lunch special price is so cheap and good!  It comes with soup and egg roll!

I usually don't have any complaints;however, today I ordered 2 shrimp egg Foo Yung and it was not edible. The eggs were burned, shrimp cooked too hard, and the gravy tasted sour. Just was not a good meal. I spent $39 for a meal that ended up in the trash.😓

We decided to try a new place for fried rice, picked. this place because of the fried rice picture in the white containers and decent reviews. Well I want to update that they only do single servings of fried rice now!!!! So freaking annoyed so they charge the same as other places that serve more and it really wasn’t that good!!! Lacks flavor and eggs and they serve small amounts!!! Ugh not coming back!

name: Subway
address: 14455 Cullen Blvd #104, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: Best Sandwiches Periodt.

They charged me wrong, and the manager won't talk to me. Just keeps hanging up without working anything out. Just blames me for not checking the order and what they charged me. Very unprofessional. Don't go here!
Good place for fast food

I was just here with my daughter a week ago. Usually at Subway everything is stocked, looks fresh and delicious; however, at this location I can't honestly say that. They were out of Italian herbs bread, pepper Jack cheese, vinegar, and cucumbers lol. I was like wow what do you have. I just wished I had kept going further to the location near Kroger. I won't be stopping at this location again. And the workers were just blah like "lady I really dont care about your cucumbers" from the expression on their faces. Oh and my sandwiches were so thrown together.. they must've been new workers.
Usually not a wait when I go but I avoid peak times too. When I am ready to eat, I hate waiting.

name: Panda Express
address: 4022 S Sam Houston Pkwy E, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: I was not a fan before this location opened. This location has changed my opinion. The food is good and the service is great. I have become fan.

7:55pm 1/29/2020 they were almost out of EVERYTHING. Picture shows mostly everyone waiting for their food. A couple customers came inside from the drive through asking for the manager. When they first opened service was awesome, and they had enough food for customers, clearly things have gone downhill.

I wish you guys have a phone number here si I can call. I did a pickup and I didnt check the order, I guess my mistake, and it came with rice instead of noodles. 
Unfortunately my break was almost over so I couldn't go back and change it. I dont eat rice :(
The chicken was good.
Didn't eat in so not sure how that experience is but to go is very fast n food is obviously fresh
Their food is really good but with the Virus going around don't trust what you see so check your food

name: Sisco Donuts
address: 14455 Cullen Blvd, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: Best apple fritters I've ever had.
Great selection of donuts, kolaches, tacos and drinks. Clean restrooms. Friendly staff.
Great place for breakfast love everything the serve..always soft always fresh..and place is very clean and organized
Great stop for morning hunger. 👍

Best kolache dough in town. Won't have the same atmosphere as other places (not really the kind of place you want to eat inside) but the staff and food are unmatched. This is the best kept secret of you're into delicious kolache and doughnuts.

name: Ritala Bakery
address: 14519 Cullen Blvd, Houston, TX 77047, USA

name: Texas esterling cullings y el 8
address: 14455 Cullen Blvd, Houston, TX 77047, USA

name: Teta’s Kitchen
address: 14770 Cullen Blvd, Houston, TX 77047, USA
reviews: So glad we tried this food truck! Delicious authentic food. Some of the best falafel I've ever had! Also liked the gyro, grape leaves, hummus... The owners are so friendly too. They even let us try some samples! Give them a try!
Open till 11 on a Sunday?! I found a new GEM! Ordered the Greek salad which was super tasty!

The food tastes homemade with love. I passed by the neighborhood gas station after school to get my usual college dinner: chips and ice cream. I had seen this food truck and decided to finally give it, and a proper nutritious meal, a try. I was pleasantly surprised! The family running it is very lovely and treat you like family too. The woman is very sweet and attentive and really puts love and care into the food she makes. Truly an unexpected pleasant experience.
Everything is good but Gyro and Shawarma are exceptional. Teta is a sweetheart and gave me a hand sanitizer spritz "for the road."

-Friendly, authentic cooks
-Nothing on the menu over $9
-Actually really convenient location
-Open till 11pm
-Food is delicious
-Healthy options

name: Taqueria Juquilita
address: 1014 N Main St, Pearland, TX 77581, USA

name: Curious glass
address: 1014 N Main St, Pearland, TX 77581, USA

name: Studio Movie Grill
address: 8440 S Sam Houston Pkwy E, Houston, TX 77075, USA
reviews: More than a 🎬movie🎥 theater🎞; it's also a bar🍸and grill ♨ This theater even has days/times to specifically cater movie showings to children with autism and disabilities! It's a wonderful💖 thing as I got to visit as a nurse with some of my pediatric clients. Very nice and clean. Fast, friendly, proficient and professional service/staff. Wide selection of entrees and beverages for children and adults👍🏾👍🏾

Love this place because it's close to the house and their food is great. Service is pretty good  except they always seem to forget my extra sauce for whatever reason. Nice chairs but I wish they reclined. Other than that, nice spot.

This venue was clean. The ticket counter was a little slow though. Menu is not restaurant quality. (I didn't deduct a star because it's a MOVIE theater, not a restaurant. Just want you to know because the menu prices are pricy.)

(Please LIKE if you find this post helpful &/or you agree.)
$5 on Tuesdays. Service is usually proficient but not stellar. Food is usually served off temperature. Theaters are clean. Seats do not recline. The food is consistently bad.

My first visit was yesterday and my  cousin and I were in for a treat! I  needed handicap access, which was very  nicely arranged and at the  push of a button, waiters/ waitresses are there with excellent customer service. They have great  quality food and deserts. I reccomend the chicken nachos which were delicious. An awesome way to enjoy a movie with family and friends.

name: BreWingZ Restaurant and Bar
address: 8490 S Sam Houston Pkwy E, Houston, TX 77075, USA
reviews: Wings were great! Although, I believe the suicidal are more tasty hot than actually spicy. Our server Brandon was excellent and very attentive, can’t wait to visit again. Great experience.
Good location and service has always been great
Service could use a little work. Food is always great. Sports are always on, so if you're not much into sports the view might annoy you. But other than that, it's a great place to come by and enjoy.
Surprisingly good wings. Their Carolina Gold sauce is the best wing sauce I've found in a while. Yes, it has that typical wing place vibe but it's worth it for the great value and good flavor.
Food was great. Service was great. The waiter Arturo did a fantastic job. He stayed on top of his game. I never had to ask for refills.

name: Whataburger
address: 11510 Pearland Pkwy, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews: First time at Whataburger. The meat is absolutely, without a doubt, much much rounder than Wendy's. For a fast food Burger Joint, the service was really good.

Stopped by for an early dinner with my child and had a great experience. After a rough day it was nice to be greeted by such a nice person.  Monica took our order and provided fantastic service. It’s people like her that can turn your day into a great one. Thanks again Monica.
We had a great experience here! Both the lady taking our order and giving us our food were so nice and they delivered great food!!! Definitely going back!!

Service excellent but restaurant was dirty, floors, tables and rest room needed cleaning. Put my hands under the chair to move it forward and got sticky stuff on them. Fries very good but drink was weak and hamburger dry, this place is fairly new si I expected better.
We ordered 7 chicken sandwiches, and got 7 sloppy burgers

name: Subway
address: 10555 Pearland Pkwy Suite C, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews: It was a nice experience, all the employees very friendly

The gentleman was awesome and very patient and made our sandwiches with great care. He has only been working ten days and he should get a raise. He was terrific I wish all employees took the extra care and time like him.
Watch your food, my roasted chicken was not cooked and I got old veggies eeew
Worse salad I've ever had especially for the price👎
This subway is horrible !!! Never anybody put 1 person working they are extremely slow !!!   Every time I’ve come i tried to give them a chance but every time it’s the same thing

name: 2 A Day Sports Bar
address: 10555 Pearland Pkwy G, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews:
Update From My Friend: So owner or one of the owners reached out to me today. He was very apologetic and assured me that I should have absolutely been let it  in (i mean... Have you seen me? ) and that he was very disappointed in his staff that night. He supports tattoos and anyone with them (just not overly explicit or gang bangers.... Sorry mom). He's reteaching and instructing staff upon company policy and defining it more clearly for staff and general public. He did give me his direct number and asked that I hit him up if we ever come out that he'd like to take care of us.

I am appalled that this place is even in business. A Beautiful woman was not allowed in this bar because of her neck tattoo. Now to clarify, her neck tattoo isn't a gang related thing or derogatory in any way but a stunning piece of art. I've attached a photo so all can see how ridiculous this is. I am just stunned that this happened and will make it known to all I can that they should never go here!
Great place to stop at after work if you live in the area. If they have an event there make sure you stop in. It will be something you would not want to miss.
I attended a charity event there last weekend. I had a blast. This bar is always a good place to stop at and enjoy a few drinks. When they host an event it becomes a great place!
The place was really cool,just that we didn't get in. Due to not being 21,of course.
Rodeo was cancelled and they accepted the volunteer drink tickets! Amazing service from Kelly and a great brisket grilled cheese!

name: Flaming Wok
address: 8498 S Sam Houston Pkwy E #700, Houston, TX 77075, USA
reviews: Terrible! I ordered my food in-person and paid. I waited standing at the bar top for approximately 40 minutes. The guy sees me standing there the whole time. After 40 minutes he asked did I receive my order. Clearly if you never handed it to me I did not receive it. He says oh I'm about to have them make it. I asked for my money back and left the store. I never leave negative reviews, but this was worth leaving one. Absolutely ridiculous!

Very tasty food and friendly service! The environment is also very elegant and clean! I like the noodles here and the Zuo Zongtang chicken, and the beef is also very delicious! I will give this restaurant to my friends.

Online says they were open. I called and she sounded extremely frustrated that I called because they are closed on Tuesdays. They need to fix the online hr and have a better attitude. I wont order from there tomorrow or any day!

Sorry Bro, the food has always been great here, Sadly I had a call in today
the rice was great and fantastic. The Moo Goo Gai Pan was the worst I have ever eaten. This vegetables were all soaking in what looked like flavored water. It was like a soup. I have never had it like that. I guess going back to Shan Hu Restaurant even if it is a distance. Sorry the only way I could post was by clicking on a star. This is an undeserved star

Chicken is small like left over chicken pieces. Chicken is tuff hard to chew, not much meat lots of cartilage... My gums hurt. Not buying their chicken again.
Sweet soup is different than other restaurants but really good.

name: Peña's Donuts & Diner
address: 10555 Pearland Pkwy, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews: Dropped in yesterday for the Donut Burger, which was awesome. Seen they had different coffees and figured why not? So glad I got one from there. Starbucks might be busy next door, but Pena's has better coffee hands down . Will definitely go back and try the others

We got the Captain Crunch and Boston Cream donuts, fried chicken donut sandwich (😋), veggie burrito, and iced tea. If we had only gotten the fried chicken sandwich and the tea, this would have been a 4 ⭐ experience. Not impressed with the donuts. Didn't have much flavor and seemed dry even though it was only about 9:30am. Veggie burrito had sad potatoes with a strangely rubbery texture.

Chicken and waffles.  That's all it takes for me to get excited at a breakfast place.  Really just waffles will do it too.  Throw in fried chicken and magic happens.  This is a great menu item here.  I thoroughly enjoyed it.  The Texas pecan coffee was pretty damn good too.  If you buy one of their SS coffee cups you get one free refill at each visit.  Pretty awesome.  

We got there on a Saturday morning around 9:30.  The place was hoppin but we only had to wait a couple minutes to get a table for 4.  The food came out pretty quick for them to be that busy.  And it was great.

I've been frequenting this business since their prior location. I really enjoy the variety of sweet goodies they offer not to mention the awesome lunch menu. It's very family friendly and customer's faces become familiar as they are friendly as well. I brought a few family members here today and they loved it. When I left I realized my order had egg on it  which I don't eat. One phone call corrected that problem. Customer service is usually not a problem at this establishment. I would definitely recommend if your looking for a sweet fix or tasty lunch.

Drive thru open! 
Second time I was able to come during this whole covid-19 situation. Their drive thru service is great. I did order something that wasn’t quick so I had to wait a few mins for it.
I got a frappe with sugar free hazelnut. Yumm!!! 
Their barbacoa tacos are good, too! (Not pictured)

name: Pizza Lounge
address: 10555 Pearland Pkwy j, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews:
My opinion, the best pizza & beer in town. The owner & staff are very friendly and do everything they can to give you GREAT service. They constantly & consistently change their taps.
 You can always count on them having a different beer on tap when you go back. Love you guys and gals at The Pizza Lounge. Cheers.

After reading all these great reviews, I decided to order for delivery online. Unfortunately, I never received my order. I called the restaurant and the young girl that answered the phone mentioned I had submitted the order as "Pick- Up" and I honestly thought it was an error on my part. However, upon looking at my confirmation email I clearly ordered for delivery and I was also charged a delivery fee (see attached picture). Won't be ordering from Pizza Lounge again. Still waiting for my refund.

Place is trendy with good food and nice outdoor patio area. I ordered a pepperoni pizza with cauliflower crust. It was great! I have never had a cauliflower crust pizza that is fresh have only tried frozen so this was a treat.

Have been here multiple times. Most of the time, I get a pizza with my family, but this time I decided to get the Ceaser Salad. Really good salad and a really good atmosphere. They also have a bar and a good selection of alcoholic beverages for those who would like it as well.
Ordered from the website, very easy. Good prices, the food is delicious. I will definitely recommend Pizza Lounge.

name: Smallcakes Pearland Parkway
address: 10555 Pearland Pkwy unit h, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews: Attended an event here and I truly enjoyed the staff and the food! Very neat! Very clean! Very well managed! The owner was very accommodating. I’ll definitely go back. I recommend this place if you want to meet new people, enjoy good cupcakes, and walk away feeling great about it all.

Absolutely love this shop. Great staff, the owner lady is very nice and was open to minor critique. This place has become my go-to spot for sweets. The daily specials are always great to get, but the carrot cake cupcake is what made me become a returning customer. You will not be disappointed of you stop in.

The cupcakes are good, but I feel like considering the variety of flavors there isn't anything about a particular cupcake that makes it stand out. I only tried a handful of flavors but they all tasted very similar. We tried Cookies and cream, wedding, hot fudge sundae, m&m and peanut butter cup. Wedding was my favorite and was delicious! I would like to try the ice cream next time.
I love their birthday cupcakes, so I had it made into a cake for my birthday. It was delicious!!!
Pleasant little place with a great location. Delicious snacks, both cold and baked. Games in store to make the sweets more enjoyable. Very polite staff.

name: Starbucks
address: 10501 Pearland Pkwy suite a, Houston, TX 77075, USA
reviews: Got our holiday drinks and cups.  The staff did good making all of the orders as they opened.  The drinks we ordered were perfect!
The guy that makes my mat ha green tea is amazing! Whenever he makes it, it takes 10 times better than anyone else who makes it....yummy
Great service at the drive through! Will definitely be back.
Ordered a dry cappuccino and it had at least a cup of milk in it. Staff needs better training. Not an isolated event.

There were only two customers when I visited this Starbucks and the service was still slow. Also this is my third time coming here and the wifi connection was not working. Talk to the manager he said it's and on going problem.

name: El Franco Lee Park
address: 9400 Hall Rd, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews: I really enjoyed going to this Park. I didn't do much but walk around. Ate some good food. Heard some voices. Saw some beautiful men and women. Ate some more good food. Walked around some more in my prosthesis. It was nice level ground made great for walking. So walking is what I did. I saw a bounce house but I didn't get in. I drank. I drank an ice cold monsoon and then an ice cold mountain dew. There were many beers but I did not have one. Too lots of life if pictured. #TheEnd capiche?
Swamp park is cool here. Good place to take a spin on a mountain bike or just walk.

Great park for the entire family! Safe and clean. They have sports practice and games there for football, cheer, soccer and baseball. The park has a cool wet splash for hot summers and volleyball net to add to any birthday party fun!
Cops on patrol safe for kids nice park had my granddaughters birthday therw
Numerous sports fields (football,  soccer,  baseball), nice playgrounds and water area, nature trails with observation decks.  Well maintained.

name: Circle K
address: 11499 Beamer Rd, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews: I'm in here a lot! Most of the staff is friendly and the prices aren't much different from HEB

name: Church's Chicken
address: 11334 Hughes Rd, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews: Good chicken.  Love the fried okra, just wish they would not put the okra in a plastic bag since it condenses moisture and ruins the crispyness of the okra.  They had chicken ready.  Better than the Church's on Monroe.  They had a 20 minute wait.  So I drove out of my way to this Church's.  They had the chicken and fried the okra fresh.
I like the update in the store. It’s look beautiful in and out. Biscuits are so good with the honey butter
Great prices and service. Great taste

This used to be a great location. However the only good part of my order was the biscuits. I ordered strips, okra, 1 thigh and jalapeno poppers. The strips were like jerky and I couldn't even bite through them. The okra was mushy and soggy as were the jalapenos. The "thigh" was white meat. I won't go back.

Young lady at the window was very nice. Before I got my order I asked the young lady is my large okra was in the bag the Hispanic lady said yes I get home there is no okra I got some chicken that looks horrible.

name: The Gyro Guys
address: 12403 Scarsdale Blvd, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews:
Excellent customer service.
Quick and affordable.
#2 on the menu is mouth watering with crisp veggies. Steamed rice with great seasoning.Fresh and tender meat topping; plenty of it.The kitchen staff is doing a great job in providing healthy and affordable meals to the area.
Great food but I wish they had removed the shrimp shells completely. Overall delicious

Fast and friendly. Tasty and generally healthy. I have eaten here 3 times. Something different each time. Pita bread is not the best but not bad everything else tastes fresh and authentic. The people are nice and take care of you pretty quickly. I will be back.

Good food but I'm suspicious of the portion size. It's pretty noticeable when the only difference between a large and a small platter is the amount of rice they dump in there. Not to mention this was the second time they forget part of my order and still charge me for the missing order. 

That's just stingy, negligent, and undermining customer service. Don't rip off your customers if you want to stay in business. 

If you want to get the most of of your money. Don't go here. 

If you need a convenient meal then this is ok.
New place but excellent food, traditional Greek food that tastes great

name: The Gyro Guys
address: 3104 FM 528 Rd, Webster, TX 77598, USA
reviews:
After gym me and my buddy came to this place for a quick bite. After looking at the menu I was carried away and couldn't decide what I wanted. I end up getting combo gyro meal(chicken and lamb) , which comes with fries and fountain drink and also I got chicken shawarma to go( forgot to take pics of that). 

In few minutes our food was served. I was impressed with the portion of gyro. It was nicely packed with chicken and lamb.
 
Gyro was very delicious the pita bread was soft and delicious. Chicken and lamb tasted delicious. They both had a unique flavor and burst of both flavors complemented each other. On the other hand fries were on the different level, they were seasoned with  spices and herbs and they were amazing.

My wife ate the shawarma and she told me that it was delicious. Next time I will have to try it on my own to explain.

Overall experience was good, great food, great entertainment and a great service!

Healthy is misleading. Good gyro meat though. The combo plate meal photos are misleading. The image for a schwarma for instance shows the wrap cut in half over a bed of veggies and rice. All I received was just the wrap not cut in a foil wrapper. When I inquired about the veggies and rice, I was told I could get fries. 

All of the fountain drinks are super sweet.

 A little pricy for sub par "Healthy" options.
Ate here for the first time and it was so good. First time trying hummus and LOVED it!!! Everything was very fresh and tasty. Will definitely come back when in the area.

I came across them by luck. I am very glad I did. I had the gyro fries. They were friendly when I ordered. They were quick. They brought it to my car. The process was smooth. The food was delicious. I recommend giving them a try. They also have great lunch specials I saw on the window.

The Gyro Guys is a nice enough place to eat with a variety of offerings. I have sampled the gyro (lamb), mixed plates (lamb & chicken), and the garlic fries.

The Gyro is pretty good; the bread is soft, meat is juicy, and the taste is there. The only problem is that I've gotten mixed consistency with the preparation of the gyro. At times it has been delicious, and other times, not so much. The size of the Gyro is pretty big so it definitely fills you up.

Mixed plates are a go-to; with lamb, chicken, rice, a salad, and different sauces, it's a pretty well-rounded meal. And quite delicious, too. I find the small plates a little too small and the larger portion difficult to finish.

I tried the garlic fries on one occasion; although they were alright, they had gotten soggy really quickly with the garlic sauce ladled right on top.

I never eat in the restaurant because I don't like the dining room or the odor that hits you when you enter. I always take my order to-go.

Overall, it's not a place that will overwhelm your senses but it gets the job done.

name: Tower Park
address: 12423 Scarsdale Blvd, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews: i dunno bout yall but i dont see no tower
No matter what park im in. I love each moment with my son

name: Perry and Sons Market & Grille
address: 12830 Scarsdale Blvd, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews:
1st time guest, not impressed on first experience order.  Steak ordered medium, came out well done (returned and came out correct 2nd try). Chicken Fried Chicken was extremely dry, needed extra gravy to pass it down.  3.5 ⭐️

Manager took care of us on the bill, and was pleased with the service.  Wait staff name was Jesse!

Wasnt sure what to expect but was seriously impressed with the quality of the food and the timeliness considering it was lunch. No wonder the place was full! Excellent pork chop that looks more like a slab of prime rib!
Always great steaks as well as other offerings. Try their pork chop - to die for. Brinda or James will make sure you're taken care of.

My entire family has frequented this location. We enjoy the Perry's franchise,  however this locale offers a more unique and personal touch in addition to a more casual style of dining while enjoying top shelf cuisine you may also drop in to pick up some of the best quality meats the Houston area has to offer to bring home and grill yourself.  A place they truly remember your name and you will be glad you came.

OMG one of the best restaurants I have ever gone to.  The Steaks are Awesome and Juicy I like mine Medium Rare and they get it just right not bloody or overcooked. I recommend everyone to come and try it. Everything is Delicious like the Pastas, Hamburgers, Rib Eye Steaks, and  don't get me started on the Pork Chop one of my Favorite dishes.

name: Pho Hai Van
address: 12730 Scarsdale Blvd, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews: This is the place to be if you love Vietnamese food,  the Pho is spot on and the lunch selections have a lot of value.  You get a lot of bang for your buck.  The food is very good as well,  it is easily the best Pho in the area.  I have tried many other places down the road and around the surrounding area. This place wins hands down.  The interior is quiet and inviting with enormous amount of friendly staff and great customer service.  So when you need your fix, check this place out pronto.

Love this place ❤️ always get spring rolls for me and egg rolls for my husband. My kids love food here too. Pho is perfect in cold weather or when you are feeling a little sick or actually who am I kidding, whenever you are hungry.
Been coming here for years. Food is always good. Vietnamese coffee with condensed milk is the best ever!

The pho was very tasty. The soup came out very hot and plenty for a great price. However, I cannot give this 5 stars because the service was not great. I had to get up from my table twice to find someone to serve us. I hope they improve their service and staff because I would love to come back.
Great food and I love their lemonade. Ive eaten here numerous times and have never been disappointed

name: Dairy Queen
address: 12930 Scarsdale Blvd, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews:
My husband and I was stranded in a broken down big truck on the other side of over pass and had to walk about the distance of 7 street blocks..We walk to this location and received 5 star service. This location had a way to order if you could not drive thru ....there was a number 
On the window for walk up customers......the find was excellent! and the manger was excellent.  And the female worker was ⁰hospitable....Thanks for this great experience  Dairy Queen! ....Please tell Burger King how to show love to all their customers like this.

I love the burgers, but they ALWAYS  make you wait.. Even if the place is pretty empty.. I usually stick to their burgers but the other day, I tried the beef taco salad.. It looked really gross. Couldn't even see the lettuce, it was like a taco shell full of beef.. It looked nothing at all like the picture. Just stick to the burgers, they're really good.

Great food and amazing customer service! I was at the drive-thru and I  placed my order. The cashier asked if I could pull forward and she would bring me my food. Minutes later she walked up to my car and handed me my food and as I was pulling up to park and eat my food, I noticed something cold and to my surprise, it was a Dilly Bar (ice cream bar). That was so sweet and I think they did that as a sorry for the wait, but the wait was literally only like 3 min. Keep up the great work guys!

Food was good .. me and my husband went in to eat and we order 2 of the same meals and then when the lady brought one meal to table she said other was on the way.. so my husband began to eat and bout half way through his meal the same lady brought a tray of our two meals I explained to hear what was goin on so she left all the food.. then a different lady came to table never said sorry but wanted other meal back.. they could handle the situation different

Honestly, we don't live far from this dairy Queen. By the time my husband got home the fries were cold, also come to find out after the dumping the fries out the box... The damn fries were kinda wet. Then to top it all off the hamburger he got was smaller than expected.

name: Wendy's
address: 14304 Gulf Fwy, Houston, TX 77034, USA
reviews: Breakfast was cold and nasty.  Coffee was cold.  It look like they took one strip of bacon and broke it into three pieces and put on the baconator breakfast  sandwich,  mind you it was supposed to be  6 pieces of bacon.  Then they forgot to give me the orange juice that I ordered with the honey butter chicken biscuit. The guy that took my order was nice. He was taking money and then going to the back to help prepare food.  I guess he was the manager,  I heard him constantly telling the team to focus.  There were 5 people working two red shirts and three black shirts.  The lady working drive through was running from drive thru to front counter to give customers their order.  The service was really slow.  The youngest guy there couldn't identify a large cup.  They need to change the oil they cook the food in.  I will not return for breakfast. Gave 2 stars for cleanliness and nice customer service.

Get the app. Bargains galore
Salads are impressive. And those chicken sandwiches are sometimes 2 fer

If you like hair in your food, by all means eat here! I have a video of it, but I’m saving that for when I get in touch with corporate. I have worked in the food industry before and I’m very understanding, but that was disgusting! Not to mention, a month or so ago when I went there, I ordered then changed the size of my fries and the cashier rolled her eyes at me & was so rude (her name is Ash something) I let that go but hair in my food is absolutely unacceptable.
This Wendy's  is new fresh and clean. Food is always fresh hot. Very fast service.
New Wendy 's Restaurant on Scarsdale Blvd at I.45, good location.

name: Danny's Donut Shop
address: 12700 Scarsdale Blvd, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews: Best donut shop on Scarsdale. Donut's are made fresh almost on the spot. I always get a half dozen of hot glaze, they are the best.
Great kolaches! I love their light and buttery bread.
The donuts are good, probably the best on Scarsdale and better than Dunkin Donuts which is a little south down the road.
We come here all the time. Kolaches are always fresh and sometimes they give free donuts in the afternoon upon purchase
Great food and nice owners

name: Tapioca Xpress
address: 12800 Scarsdale Blvd, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews: Kimchi fries are OK. A little bit soggy. The smoothies aren't smooth and have too many ice chunks. The Thai tea is good. Prices are about average. Not much seating so not good for groups.

Lovely place! Staff/owners were super cool and extremely helpful and informative of their selections! Had a jasmine tea that was very high quality with nice strong  floral notes. A must-stop for avid tea drinkers.  Will go back!
Nice little boba shop. Their coffee with fluffy frozen coconut drink is amazing.
Love this place. Friendly staff. Fast and efficient. Drinks are good. I love their Jasmin Milk Tea.

Best iced milk tea in the area! Trust me I have tried a lot here. I asked for less sugar and it's just about right. The girl said they use black sugar and black tea here. Their milk tea tastes strong of tea:)

name: Divang Cafe
address: 12720 Scarsdale Blvd, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews: I don't know what this place is just went in  by accident  and there was techno music , games , it was dark , I just walk away  I think it's a game room !

name: Flushing Meadows Park
address: 11747-11799 Flushing Meadows Dr, Houston, TX 77089, USA
reviews: Nice small park! It has a covered wooden gazebo, picnic table, two sets of swings, and plastic play-structure with slides.  It's also fully enclosed with a latching gate, so I go here often at the end of a walk with the dog to let him get the last of his energy out.
Lot nice people
Nice relaxing
Its a good safe park i have been to it with my child and seen others with kids a few times .. the only down to it is its small my son is 6 and called it a baby park in which i agreed .. .
It's better then it was but with more options close by it's not my first choice

name: Dixie Deli
address: 364 FM1959, Houston, TX 77034, USA
reviews: Excellent sandwiches. Some of the best gumbo in town. Great people.

Mr & Mrs D are awesome; excellent service, Excellent personalities, & did I not mention the BEST CRAWFISH CRAB CORN BISQUE KNOWN TO MANKIND 😋! IT’S MY WIFE & I FAVORITE! When I was working @ TGI FRIDAY’S, ME & MY COWORKERS WERE ALWAYS ANTICIPATING THEY’RE FRIDAY WEEKLY DROP OFF ORDERS TO US THAT WE PLACED EVERY WEEK WITH THEM! 

Love you Guys, peace&blessings...
Fantastic lunch spot with super friendly staff! Amazing what you get for the price! Did I mention they have Coke in glass bottles!?
This is place is a hidden gem. Good food good service. A pretty good selection of sandwiches and salads and soup as well. I recommend to give it a try at least.

This is a quality place.  Owned by the family they are so nice.  This is what a family owned business should be like in Texas.  The sandwiches are a good size and there are all kinds of drinks and chips to choose from.  And while you wait you can hit the dive shop up next door that they also run.  Great place!

Some really GOOD EATS!
Friday its a buffet. They have a really good buffet also, and very good customers service.

This is my spot whenever I'm on this side of town.
Is this Nihari?? Never going back there again
Very interesting foods... different taste...Wouldn’t really recommend the fried sandwich wrap though.
Food is great here must try

name: Shell
address: 11912 Galveston Rd, Houston, TX 77034, USA
reviews: Used to be Texaco. Not sure if it's old gas remains but I have a sensitive ECU map. This 93 octane caused knocking.

name: Jack in the Box
address: 11912 Galveston Rd Ste A, Houston, TX 77034, USA
reviews: I typically dont leave reviews for fast food but the service at this location was top notch! I was very impressed. Unfortunately good customer service is hard to find these days but the manager AND employees (or at least the ones that were there this evening) were fantastic. The food was hot and fresh, the lobby was clean, all around a great experience. Keep it up! :)

Vistied here today. We are at the drive thru ordering popcorn chicken meal. And we asked the person taking our order... if the large box would feed to people? In ENGLISH and he said I don't speak Spanish:/ My husband said back in not talking to you in Spanish. I asked if the large box of popcorn chicken would feed to people. He said okay you want the large order:/. Then we pull up and he is as Mexican as can be. What's wing with speaking Spanish? Just like what's wrong with speaking in sign language? NOTHING
Great service. Little bit of a wait, but all of my food was fresh, and the cashier even hooked me up with a quencher size drink for no charge. Absolutely going back here again.

Came to get an order of churos and the lady taking the order (Tenesha) was very rude. Cut me off while I was talking. Just had an attitude like she didn’t want to be at work (then go home!). Not only that, she was wearing the SAME gloves for every transaction she took, and every order she handed to the customers in front of me as she used for my order and transaction. Defeats the purpose of gloves during a pandemic.
30 taco's fast and fresh.

name: Burger House
address: 12430 TX-3, Webster, TX 77598, USA
reviews: My new favorite 🍔 spot! I love this place. Always a great meal every time. Service is quick and friendly. They do have good lunch specials too.

Decent place to grab a quick bite , considering not much food choices around. The place seems a little run down.  The chicken salad wasn't to bad . The onion rings seemed like they were left to long in the grease. I've had better at Burger King or whataburger. They seem to have good burgers and the prices seem fair.  If your trying to eat healthy I dont recommend this spot .

Decided to try this place out. Personally my opinion I did not like the taste of the meat and I didn’t like the bread either. The fries were ok.  But my mom said she loved everything. So you would just have to try it for yourself because everyone has different taste buds.

Extremely slow!! Almost 40 minutes to have my lunch prepared. I ordered  chicken and white rice. I got fries instead of rice. Turns out they ran out of rice but I wasn't given the choice to pick another side. Very disappointed. Not coming back.
The buns are homemade and delicious. They toast just right and the bulgoki are yummy. Haven't tried the Korean ramen yet but thats is next on my list.
